story-moment.DISCOVERED BY EGO: Orphaned on her home world, Mantis is discovered by Ego while still in a larva state, who raises her by hand and keeps her as his own to quell his neurotic behaviors.
story-moment.MEETING THE GUARDIANS: Mantis encounters the Guardians of the Galaxy Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket and Groot, after Ego saves them from an impeding attack from the Sovereign.
story-moment.UNEARTHING EGO'S PLAN: Caring for her new friends, Mantis could no longer keep her knowledge of Ego’s true plans for Peter Quill and the Expansion to Drax, Gamora and Nebula.
story-moment.PUTTING PLANET EGO TO SLEEP: Empowered by Drax’s belief in her, Mantis harnessed her powers to force Ego the living planet to sleep as the Guardians attacked.
story-moment.SUBDUING THANOS: Presenting a strong front against the Mad Titan, Mantis subdues Thanos with her empathic powers as Spider-Man and Iron Man are close to remove Thanos’ grip on the Infinity Gauntlet.

powers+abilities.POWERFUL EMPATH: Mantis is an empath who can sense others’ feelings and emotions with a touch, to which her antennae respond by lighting up.
powers+abilities.SLEEP INDUCTION: Mantis can induce sleep and manipulate emotions to a degree, able to make Ego sleep when he is in planet form or debilitate the Mad Titan Thanos for a time.
powers+abilities.EMOTION MANIPULATION: Mantis can also alter emotions, helping a sad person feel contentment or a stubborn person compliant.
powers+abilities.ENHANCED DURABILITY: Mantis has enhanced durability, as she has proven to be resilient to injury.
